title: Jobs at Art Museums (JAM 2022): Handle with Care
short_description: Hear from museum staff who work directly with objects in the museum’s collection.
header_description: JAM is a unique opportunity for college students to make professional connections and learn about careers in the museum field.
list_description: Hear from museum staff who work directly with objects in the museum’s collection.
description:
Hear from museum staff who work directly with objects in the museum’s collection.

Speakers:
Isaac Facio, Associate Conservator of Textiles, Conservation

Thomas Huston, Technician, Architecture and Design and Modern and Contemporary Art

Rachel Sabino, Associate Conservator of Objects, Conservation

Jonathan Mathias, Senior Photographer, Imaging

Participation by museum staff and departments does not indicate a need to hire. Staff will not be accepting resumes or offering interviews. For questions, email universitypartners@artic.edu.
